manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Certified Natural by NATRUE NATRUE certified cosmetics are produced using sustainable production processes with exceptionally high standards of quality you can trust. Certified B Corporation The international non-profit B Lab has now certified that we meet the highest standards of social and environmental performance, balancing profit and purpose to make the world a better place. WELEDA x TerraCycle We partnered with TerraCycle to create a free recycling program for all empty Weleda products. Learn more about our recycling program at terracycle.com/weleda Sourcing with Respect The Union for Ethical BioTrade certifies that biodiversity is being protected during the cultivation, harvesting and processing of the ingredients we use.

About Weleda Imagine a brand so in tune with nature, it harvests its ingredients in alignment with the moon and stars. A brand that has studied plants for 100 years. In Switzerland 1921, Weleda was founded on the belief that people are part of nature, grounded in a commitment to carefully orchestrate formulas that work with the body’s rhythms to awaken skin’s natural functions. Weleda is still creating those products today, that recognize the power of the natural world to balance mind, body and spirit. Skin Food Nourishing Body Lotion Ultra-rich, deep nourishment for skin that craves intensive moisture This wonderful offering is an extension of our Skin Food collection. Now, the ultra-rich, nourishing power of Skin Food Original is captured in an easily-spreadable lotion. This creamy formula with essential fatty acids and pure plant extracts immediately comforts dry skin, absorbing to a non-greasy finish. This body lotion is crafted with high-quality, aromatic plant extracts of pansy, chamomile, rosemary and calendula that's been at the heart of our Skin Food Original formula since 1926. Immediately leaves skin feeling nourished and comforted with a silky feel Encourages a healthy-looking glow- a sensory experience every time Intensive, long-lasting moisture for dry to very dry skin Use after a bath or shower, applying with gentle upward strokes Made with vegan-friendly ingredients, no animal testing Free from parabens, phthalates synthetic preservatives, and synthetic fragrances Certified Natural by NATRUE

Weleda Skin Food Ultra-Light Dry Oil Weleda Energy Body Wash Weleda Unscented Body Lotion Weleda Pampering Body Lotion Weleda Hydrating Body Lotion Weleda Refreshing Body Lotion Delivers moisture with a weightless, fine-mist spray to nourish skin Unwind and relax Immediately soothes and comforts sensitive skin Luxurious moisture that offers indulgence every day to help skin feel smooth and soft Deep, replenishing moisture that quenches dry, thirsty skin Refreshing moisture for skin that needs a quick pick me up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite lotion!
reviews.reviewText: I also use their body butter and hand cream. I was so excited to see that they make a body lotion too! I also want to check out their other products.This company seems to make high quality products with great ingredients. I’ve been slowly replacing my big-name brand products (that are full of toxic crap) with products made with more natural and safe ingredients, and am so happy to have found Weleda! Not only are the ingredients safe, but the lotion feels so nice and leaves my skin feeling moisturized but not greasy. It smells nice too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Daily Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I use this lotion daily and love the way it softens and absorbs into my skin. The smell is minimal, if non-existant, without chemical smell of most moderate-priced body lotions. Love it. Buy it every month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price you pay this is the BEST lotion you’ll find for soft skin. Only thing I’ve found better is twice the price. I still use this all the time though!! Natural scent too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that this is cleaner ingredients and actually moisturizes my body. The scent is a little overbearing and my husband hates when I wear it to bed because the scent is a lot, but I kind of learned to like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It smells good, works well and is long lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is organic and smells great! Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This feels good when I put it on, but, my skin feels dry in the evening. I have tried moisturizers that work better than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my very favorite scents
reviews.reviewText: Awesome lotion w/ ingredients one can feel good about. Works well and the scent is among my favorites. It smells like green-green garden w/ a hint of marzipan. Like, if Alice Waters had a skincare line, this might be her signature scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent lotion, it smells good, not too strong, is not greasy and leaves my skin nourished.

Achat effectué pour une peau sèche à cause du froid.J'aime beaucoup son odeur, ça sent les plantes.Crème onctueuseJ'ai vu du changement suite à son application.Je trouve que globalement Weleda est une bonne marque, j'ai eu l'occasion de tester pour bébé, la grossesse et pour femme et je n'ai jamais été déçuEn plus elle utilise des produits naturels donc c'est top si cela vous intéresse
Super Hautgefühl / zieht gut ein / toller Duft

reviews.reviewTitle: Weleda e' una delle marche migliori
reviews.reviewText: Utilizzo i prodotti della Weleda da una vita: non contengono derivati del petrolio o fragranze sintetiche e non costano una follia. Questa e' la versione crema fluida per il corpo, sorella della ben piu' famosa versione concentrata per il viso.Si stende facilmente, idrata la pelle del corpo e non appiccica (occorre farla assorbire per un paio di minuti). Ha uno strano odore (apparentemente di lavanda ma a me sembra cocco!!) che fortunatamente svanisce quasi subito.L'acquisto mensilmente con l'abbonamento amazon e risparmio un euro rispetto al prezzo pieno. Va bene anche come crema mani, piedi e volendo anche per il viso. Consigliata.
